title: enna manada
sahitya:
enna manada Donka tiddasO shrInivAsa enna manada Donka tiddisO


anupallavi

  enna manada Donka tiddisi ninna sEvakanAda mEle 
innu samshayavEke krSNa ninna caraNadalli sErisO


caraNam 1    udayavAdare Udada cinte adara mEle bhOgada cinte hadinAlgu lOkangaLanALa bEkemba cinte 
idu puNya idu pApavendu hrdayadali bhayavillade madanOhitanAde ninna padava nambade dInadayALO
    caraNam 2    neremaneya bhAgya nODi sahisalArade asuyanAgi hari smaraNage vimukhanAde narara stutiya mADide 
parara satige para annakke tirugi tirugi caphalanAde guru hariyara dUSiNi maruLAde dInasharaNya
    caraNam 3    agaNita sukha bandare nA agaNita dukkhakhariyembuve jagadoLu lAbhavu bandare dhanika nAnembe 
mige hAnige hari dUSisi negedu patanga kiccili biLva bageyAdenu purandara viTTala khagarAja suvAhana
